pages.text: To improve upon one's falconry skill with your $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/bald_eagle)Bald Eagle$(/l), a Falconry Hood can be crafted.$(br2)The hood can be placed on an eagle's head, and an eagle with be able to be piloted by its owner, like a drone.$(br2)If the eagle flies further than 150 blocks from its owner, it will attempt to return.
To stop controlling the eagle, the owner can also sneak. The hood can be removed from the eagle with shears.
